tags.name: sb-action-logger
tags.description: A visual element to show action logs in Storybook demos

properties.name: simple
properties.description: Simple mode, which only shows a single log

cssProperties.description: Primary color of the visual cue

cssProperties.description: Secondary color of the visual cue
